alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Norfolk; Plymouth; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:10PM EDT until September 08 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR ESSEX...NORTH CENTRAL NORFOLK...SUFFOLK...EASTERN MIDDLESEX AND NORTHERN PLYMOUTH COUNTIES... At 310 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pelham to North Andover to near Weston, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported several trees downed in Chelmsford and Westford MA between 240 PM and 245 PM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Boston, Lowell, Cambridge, Quincy, Lynn, Newton, Lawrence, Somerville, Haverhill, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Revere, Peabody, Methuen, Arlington, Everett, Salem, and Billerica. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
